meanings.sent1: She enjoyed reembroidering her favorite dress with colorful threads.
meanings.sent2: I will reembroider the flower pattern on this fabric to make it more vibrant.
meanings.sent3: The tailor was reembroidering the shirt, making it look brand new.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like threads, reembroidering the fabric of her life.
meanings.sent5: The artist spent hours reembroidering the intricate design on the tapestry.

meanings.sent1: After finishing the dress, she decided to reembroider it with lace.
meanings.sent2: The tailor will reembroider the initials on the handkerchief for a personal touch.
meanings.sent3: He was reembroidering the pillowcase with a funny quote.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter reembroidered the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The sun's rays reembroidered the sky with golden hues at sunset.

meanings.sent1: Her reembroidering of the tablecloth added a delicate touch to the dining table.
meanings.sent2: The reembroidering of the tapestry brought out its intricate details.
meanings.sent3: The reembroidering of the quilt made it a cherished family heirloom.
meanings.sent4: The reembroidering of the flag symbolized unity and strength.
meanings.sent5: The reembroidering of the costume transformed it into a work of art.
